docblock.description: DZ uses the Joomla Framework (http://www.joomla.org), a GNU/GPLv2 content management system
An internal class inspired by the filter model of wordpress.
Contain all filter names and all functions name used for each filters.
docblock.long-description: Structure: - filter_1 - function_1.1 - function_1.2 - filter_2 - function_2.1

docblock.description: Add a filter function into a filter group
Passthrough content into all filter functions of a group.
docblock.long-description: How the content is modified is based on the behavior of each filter function. Example Usage: // Replace all emoticon inside $content into image $filter->applyFilter($content, "emoticon");

tag.name: param
tag.description: The content variable which needs to be filtered. Can be of any type.

docblock.description: DZ uses the Joomla Framework (http://www.joomla.org), a GNU/GPLv2 content management system
This class has the responsibility to connect classes together
Loads a class from specified directories.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The class name to look for ( dot notation ).

docblock.description: DZ uses the Joomla Framework (http://www.joomla.org), a GNU/GPLv2 content management system
The class which has the responsibility to provide API for building template based on DZ Framework
Default priority for newly added stylesheets or scripts
Template instances
docblock.long-description: Contain all the template instances created by this class

docblock.description: Store the application's parameters
Store the added javascript
Store the javascript which need to execute when the dom is ready
Store the added style sheet
Internal filter
Get a template instance specified by its name.
docblock.long-description: Automatically create a template instance if it didn't exists.

docblock.description: Constructor
docblock.long-description: This will initialize the class when it is declared the first time. Some helper variables will be set and an internal filter for this class will also be created.

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) The name of the template which we want to build by this class. DEFAULT: null

docblock.description: INITIALIZER
docblock.long-description: Get and set important variables. The other functions depend heavily on this one. Do not use any other methods without first running of this function.

docblock.description: A function to make sure we have a valid path
Get the name of the current template
Get the default menu item's ID
Alternative way to retrieve a parameter

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) Default value if the parameter is not set. DEFAULT: null

docblock.description: Alternative way to set a parameter

tag.name: return
tag.description: The parameter's value which just be set

docblock.description: Include the layout file specified by its name
Count number of modules for a position or expression
docblock.long-description: Refer to JDocumentHTML documentation for more details

tag.name: return
tag.description: The number of modules available in that position

docblock.description: Display individual module position

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) The span width of div wrapper for current position. If equals to 0, there will be no div wrapper around the position. DEFAULT: 0

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) Still creates the div wrapper if there's no module assigned to current position (but does not when span width is 0). DEFAULT: FALSE

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) Specific style for all modules in this position. DEFAULT: "dz".

docblock.description: Display a row of related module positions

tag.name: param
tag.description: All positions with this prefix will be display. The number of positions will be determine from params.

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) Custom class for the row. DEFAULT: "".

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) This will override the "Force Position" settings from template's params. DEFAULT: NULL (not set)

docblock.description: Check for any module-assigned positions in a row

tag.name: param
tag.description: The prefix of all the module positions displayed in this row.

tag.name: return
tag.description: TRUE if at least 1 position has a module assigned to it

docblock.description: Enqueue stylesheet file with its priority

tag.name: param
tag.description: True to indicate that the file path is relative to the root URL

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) Lower value mean higher priority, i.e The CSS file will be added first. DEFAULT: DZ::DEFAULT_PRIORITY

docblock.description: Enqueue group of stylesheet files with the same priority
Directly add some stylesheet code into the head of the document.
docblock.long-description: If the document is FINALIZED, this function will no longer have any effect.

docblock.description: Enqueue javascript file with its priority

tag.name: param
tag.description: True to indicate that the file path is relative to the root URL

tag.name: param
tag.description: (optional) Lower value means higher priority. i.e The file will be added first. DEFAULT: DZ::DEFAULT_PRIORITY

docblock.description: Enqueue groups of script file with the same priority
Directly add some javascript code into the head of the document
Add script into document head and auto connect it with domready event of the document.
FINALIZER
docblock.long-description:
This method will do the final work for the stylesheet and javascript functions, i.e actually put js and css into the document head.
The document will be in finalized state after this step, i.e all stylesheet and javascript functions will no longer have effect after running this methods.

docblock.description: Shortcut for filtering methods of the variable __filter
Shortcut for filtering methods of the variable __filter
DZ uses the Joomla Framework (http://www.joomla.org), a GNU/GPLv2 content management system
This class contains configuration information for using in DZ class
